projects.title: Exo Task Manager
projects.description:
This project aims to develop a mobile application for task management. It will allow users to create, organize, and prioritize their tasks efficiently. The app will have features like task categorization, due date reminders, and task sharing with other users. The project will be implemented using React Native framework.

## Features

- User authentication and registration
- Task creation and editing
- Task categorization and prioritization
- Due date reminders
- Task sharing with other users

## Technologies

- React Native
- Firebase Authentication
- Firebase Realtime Database
- Redux

projects.title: Shopbook
projects.description:
This project aims to build an e-commerce website for selling handmade crafts. The website will provide a platform for artisans to showcase and sell their unique creations. Users will be able to browse through various categories, add items to their cart, and make secure online payments. The project will be developed using the MERN stack.

## Features

- User registration and login
- Product browsing and filtering
- Shopping cart functionality
- Secure online payments
- Order tracking

## Technologies

- MongoDB
- Express.js
- React.js
- Node.js

projects.title: Grey Skies
projects.description:
This project aims to create a weather forecasting application that provides accurate and real-time weather information. Users will be able to search for weather conditions of any location worldwide. The app will display current weather, hourly forecasts, and a 7-day forecast. The project will utilize APIs to fetch weather data.

## Features

- Location-based weather search
- Current weather display
- Hourly forecasts
- 7-day forecast
- Weather alerts

## Technologies

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- OpenWeatherMap API

projects.title: JustFood
projects.description:
This project aims to develop a food delivery mobile application that connects users with local restaurants. Users will be able to browse menus, place orders, and track their deliveries in real-time. The app will also include features like user reviews, restaurant ratings, and payment integration.

## Features

- User registration and login
- Restaurant browsing and menu display
- Order placement and tracking
- User reviews and ratings
- Payment integration

## Technologies

- React Native
- Node.js
- Express.js
- MongoDB

projects.title: Facetweet
projects.description:
This project aims to create a social media platform for sharing photos and connecting with friends. Users will be able to upload photos, apply filters, and share them with their followers. The platform will also include features like user profiles, news feed, and direct messaging.

## Features

- User registration and login
- Photo uploading and filtering
- News feed and timeline
- User profiles and followers
- Direct messaging

## Technologies

- Ruby on Rails
- PostgreSQL
- React.js
- AWS S3

projects.title: Move Meter
projects.description:
This project aims to develop a fitness tracking mobile application that helps users monitor their exercise routines and progress. The app will allow users to set fitness goals, track their workouts, and provide insights on their performance. It will also include features like calorie tracking and workout reminders.

## Features

- User registration and login
- Fitness goal setting
- Workout tracking
- Performance insights
- Calorie tracking

## Technologies

- Flutter
- Firebase Authentication
- Firebase Firestore
- Google Fit API

tickets.title: User authentication and registration
tickets.description:
Implement user authentication and registration functionality using Firebase Authentication.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to create an account with a valid email and password.
- Users should be able to log in with their registered credentials.
- Passwords must be securely hashed and stored.
- Provide error messages for invalid login attempts.
- Implement 'Forgot Password' functionality with password reset capability.
- Ensure proper error handling for any potential authentication issues.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Task creation and editing
tickets.description:
Allow users to create and edit tasks in the mobile application.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to create a new task with a title and description.
- Users should be able to edit the title and description of existing tasks.
- Each task should have a unique identifier.
- Provide a 'Save' button to save changes to the task.
- Validate and handle edge cases, such as empty task title or description.
- Implement data synchronization to ensure changes are reflected across devices if the user is logged in from multiple devices.
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Task categorization and prioritization
tickets.description:
Implement the ability for users to categorize and prioritize their tasks.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to assign categories to tasks (e.g., Personal, Work, Shopping).
- Users should be able to set priorities for tasks (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
- Provide a visually appealing way to display task categories and priorities.
- Ensure that tasks can be filtered and sorted based on categories and priorities.
- Users should be able to easily update the category and priority of existing tasks.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Due date reminders
tickets.description:
Add functionality to send due date reminders to users for their tasks.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to set a due date for each task.
- Implement a notification system to remind users of upcoming and overdue tasks.
- Allow users to choose their preferred notification settings (e.g., notification time, frequency).
- Test the reminder system thoroughly to ensure reliability and accuracy of reminders.
tickets.author: Olivia

tickets.title: Task sharing with other users
tickets.description:
Enable users to share their tasks with other users of the application.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to invite other users to collaborate on specific tasks.
- Implement user permissions to control what collaborators can do (e.g., edit, view-only).
- Collaborators should receive real-time updates when changes are made to a shared task.
- Allow task owners to revoke sharing access from specific collaborators.
- Ensure data security and privacy when sharing tasks among users.
tickets.author: John

tickets.title: Implement user interface design
tickets.description:
Design and implement the user interface for the Exo Task Manager mobile application.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Create a visually appealing and intuitive UI design for all screens.
- Ensure the app is responsive and works well on different screen sizes and orientations.
- Implement smooth transitions and animations to enhance user experience.
- Use appropriate color schemes and typography for a cohesive design.
- Test the UI on various devices to identify and resolve layout issues.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Integrate Firebase Realtime Database
tickets.description:
Integrate Firebase Realtime Database to store and retrieve task data.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Data from the app should be synchronized with the Firebase Realtime Database.
- Ensure proper data structuring for efficient querying and retrieval.
- Implement data caching for offline access to tasks.
- Test data synchronization in various scenarios to verify accuracy and reliability.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Implement Redux for state management
tickets.description:
Use Redux to manage the state of the Exo Task Manager application.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Set up Redux and related middleware for state management.
- Ensure the entire app's state is handled through Redux.
- Implement Redux actions and reducers to manage tasks, authentication, and other app data.
- Test state management to verify data consistency and correct behavior across components.
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Add task search functionality
tickets.description:
Implement a search feature to allow users to search for specific tasks.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Add a search bar to the app's UI for entering search queries.
- Implement search functionality to filter tasks based on keywords.
- Display search results in real-time as users type in the search bar.
- Test the search feature with various search queries and verify accurate results.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement task filtering
tickets.description:
Add the ability for users to filter tasks based on categories or priorities.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Implement filter options for task categories and priorities.
- Allow users to select multiple filters simultaneously.
- Ensure the app updates the task list in real-time based on selected filters.
- Test filtering with various combinations of categories and priorities.
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Implement task sorting
tickets.description:
Allow users to sort their tasks based on due dates or priorities.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Implement sorting options for task due dates and priorities.
- Allow users to choose between ascending and descending order for sorting.
- Ensure the app updates the task list in real-time based on the selected sorting criteria.
- Test sorting functionality with tasks having different due dates and priorities.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Add task completion status
tickets.description:
Implement a feature to mark tasks as completed or incomplete.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Add a checkbox or toggle to mark a task as completed.
- Completed tasks should be visually distinguishable from incomplete tasks.
- Ensure that completed tasks are persisted and remain marked as completed even after app restarts.
- Provide an option to view only completed tasks or only incomplete tasks.
- Test marking tasks as completed and verify the status is retained correctly.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement task deletion
tickets.description:
Allow users to delete tasks from the Exo Task Manager application.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Implement a delete button or swipe gesture for deleting tasks.
- Add a confirmation prompt before permanently deleting a task.
- Ensure that deleted tasks are removed from the database and not visible to the user anymore.
- Test task deletion thoroughly to prevent accidental deletions or data corruption.
tickets.author: John

tickets.title: Add task notes functionality
tickets.description:
Implement the ability for users to add notes to their tasks.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Add a section for entering and viewing notes within each task.
- Allow users to add, edit, and delete notes for a task.
- Ensure notes are saved and associated with the correct task.
- Test adding and editing notes to verify proper functionality and data integrity.
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Implement task reminders
tickets.description:
Add functionality to set reminders for specific tasks.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users should be able to set a reminder date and time for a task.
- Implement a notification system to remind users of upcoming task reminders.
- Allow users to choose their preferred reminder settings (e.g., notification time, sound).
- Test task reminders with different reminder configurations to ensure accurate and timely notifications.
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Perform testing and bug fixing
tickets.description:
Test the Exo Task Manager application and fix any bugs or issues that arise.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Create a comprehensive test plan covering all aspects of the application.
- Perform unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.
- Identify and fix any bugs, crashes, or unexpected behaviors.
- Ensure the app is stable, performs well, and handles errors gracefully.
- Conduct usability testing to gather user feedback for further improvements.
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Implement user registration and login
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to register and login to the website so that I can access my account and make purchases.

**Tasks:**
- Create a registration form with fields for username, email, and password.
- Implement server-side validation for the registration form.
- Create a login form with fields for email and password.
- Implement server-side validation for the login form.
- Store user information securely in the database.
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Implement product browsing and filtering
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to browse through various categories of products and filter them based on my preferences.

**Tasks:**
- Create a page to display all products.
- Implement filtering options such as category, price range, and rating.
- Fetch product data from the database.

tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to add items to my cart and view the items in my cart.

**Tasks:**
- Create a cart page to display the items in the cart.
- Implement the ability to add items to the cart.
- Implement the ability to remove items from the cart.
- Update the cart total when items are added or removed.
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Implement secure online payments
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to make secure online payments for the items in my cart.

**Tasks:**
- Integrate a secure payment gateway such as PayPal or Stripe.
- Implement the ability to enter payment details.
- Handle payment processing and confirmation.

tickets.title: Implement order tracking
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to track the status of my orders.

**Tasks:**
- Create an order tracking page.
- Implement the ability to view the status of each order.
- Update the order status based on order processing.

tickets.title: Design and implement the database schema
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to design and implement the database schema for the project.

**Tasks:**
- Design the schema to store user information, product details, and order information.
- Implement the schema using MongoDB.

tickets.title: Create user interface wireframes
tickets.description:
As a designer, I need to create wireframes for the user interface of the website.

**Tasks:**
- Create wireframes for the registration and login pages.
- Create wireframes for the product browsing and filtering pages.

- Create wireframes for the order tracking page.

tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to implement the user interface of the website using React.js.

tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to implement the server-side API of the website using Express.js.

**Tasks:**

- Create API endpoints for processing payments.
- Create API endpoints for order tracking.

tickets.title: Set up MongoDB database
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to set up the MongoDB database for the project.

**Tasks:**

tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to set up the Express.js server for the project.

**Tasks:**
- Install and configure Express.js.
- Set up routes for handling API requests.
- Set up middleware for handling authentication and error handling.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Set up React.js project
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to set up the React.js project for the website.

**Tasks:**
- Install and configure React.js.
- Set up the project structure.
- Set up routing for different pages.
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Implement user authentication and authorization
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to implement user authentication and authorization for the website.

**Tasks:**
- Implement authentication middleware to verify user credentials.
- Implement authorization middleware to restrict access to certain routes.
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Implement responsive design
tickets.description:
As a designer, I need to implement responsive design for the website.

**Tasks:**
- Design and implement responsive layouts for different screen sizes.
- Test the website on different devices and screen sizes.
tickets.author: John

tickets.title: Implement unit tests
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to implement unit tests for the project to ensure code quality and reliability.

**Tasks:**
- Write unit tests for server-side API endpoints.
- Write unit tests for React components.
- Set up a testing framework such as Jest or Mocha.
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Deploy the website to a hosting platform
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to deploy the website to a hosting platform so that it can be accessed by users.

**Tasks:**
- Choose a hosting platform such as Heroku or AWS.
- Set up the necessary configurations for deployment.
- Deploy the website to the hosting platform.
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Implement location-based weather search
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to search for weather conditions of any location worldwide.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Create a search bar where users can enter a location
- Fetch weather data for the entered location using the OpenWeatherMap API
- Display the weather information on the screen
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Display current weather
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to see the current weather conditions of a location.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Retrieve the current weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API
- Display the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather description on the screen
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement hourly forecasts
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to see the weather forecast for the next few hours.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Fetch the hourly weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API
- Display the temperature, weather description, and time for each hour on the screen
tickets.author: John

tickets.title: Implement 7-day forecast
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to see the weather forecast for the next 7 days.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Retrieve the 7-day weather forecast data from the OpenWeatherMap API
- Display the temperature, weather description, and date for each day on the screen
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Display weather alerts
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be notified of any weather alerts for a specific location.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Fetch the weather alert data from the OpenWeatherMap API
- Display the alert message and severity level on the screen if there are any alerts
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Create HTML structure
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to create the HTML structure for the Grey Skies application.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Create a header section
- Create a search bar
- Create a section for displaying current weather
- Create a section for displaying hourly forecasts
- Create a section for displaying the 7-day forecast
- Create a section for displaying weather alerts
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Apply CSS styling
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to apply CSS styling to the Grey Skies application.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Style the header section
- Style the search bar
- Style the sections for displaying weather information
- Style the weather alert section
- Ensure the application is responsive and visually appealing
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Fetch weather data from OpenWeatherMap API
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to fetch weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Implement a function to make API requests
- Use the API key provided by OpenWeatherMap
- Handle API errors and display appropriate error messages
tickets.author: Michael

tickets.title: Parse and format weather data
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to parse and format the weather data received from the OpenWeatherMap API.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Extract relevant information from the API response
- Format the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and dates
- Handle any data inconsistencies or missing values
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Handle location search errors
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to handle errors that may occur during location search.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Display an error message if the entered location is not found
- Handle network errors or API failures gracefully
- Provide suggestions or alternative options if the search fails
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Optimize API requests
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to optimize the API requests to minimize unnecessary calls.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Implement caching mechanism to store previously fetched data
- Only make API requests if the data is not available in the cache or if it has expired
- Set appropriate cache expiration time
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Add loading indicators
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to add loading indicators to provide feedback to the user during data fetching.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Display a loading spinner or progress bar while waiting for API responses
- Disable user interactions during loading to prevent accidental actions
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement unit tests
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to write unit tests to ensure the functionality of the Grey Skies application.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Write test cases for each component and function
- Test API requests and responses
- Test error handling and edge cases
- Aim for high test coverage
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Perform cross-browser testing
tickets.description:
As a tester, I need to perform cross-browser testing to ensure the Grey Skies application works correctly on different browsers.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Test the application on popular browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
- Verify that all features and functionalities work as expected
- Report any compatibility issues or bugs
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Perform usability testing
tickets.description:
As a tester, I need to perform usability testing to evaluate the user experience of the Grey Skies application.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Recruit a group of users to test the application
- Observe and collect feedback on the ease of use, navigation, and overall satisfaction
- Identify any usability issues or areas for improvement
tickets.author: Olivia

tickets.title: Document project setup and usage
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to document the project setup and usage instructions for future reference.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Create a README file with detailed instructions on how to set up the project
- Include information on installing dependencies, running the application, and configuring API keys
- Provide examples and code snippets if necessary
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement user registration and login
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to register and login to the JustFood app so that I can access all its features.

**Tasks:**
- Create a registration form with fields for name, email, and password.
- Implement server-side validation for the registration form.
- Create a login form with fields for email and password.
- Implement server-side validation for the login form.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Develop restaurant browsing and menu display
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to browse local restaurants and view their menus.

**Tasks:**
- Fetch a list of restaurants from the server.
- Display the list of restaurants with their names and ratings.
- Implement a search feature to filter restaurants by name or cuisine.
- Fetch and display the menu of a selected restaurant.
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Implement order placement and tracking
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to place orders and track their status in real-time.

**Tasks:**
- Create an order form with fields for selecting items, quantities, and delivery address.
- Implement server-side validation for the order form.
- Store the order details in the database.
- Implement real-time tracking of order status using websockets.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Enable user reviews and ratings
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to leave reviews and ratings for restaurants.

**Tasks:**
- Add a review form to the restaurant page.
- Implement server-side validation for the review form.
- Store the review details in the database.
- Display the average rating and all reviews for each restaurant.
tickets.author: Olivia

tickets.title: Integrate payment gateway
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to make payments for my orders.

**Tasks:**
- Research and select a suitable payment gateway.
- Implement the payment gateway integration on the server-side.
- Create a payment form with fields for card details.
- Implement server-side validation for the payment form.
tickets.author: John

tickets.title: Design and implement user interface
tickets.description:
As a user, I want the JustFood app to have an intuitive and visually appealing user interface.

**Tasks:**
- Create wireframes and design mockups for all screens.
- Implement the user interface using React Native components.
- Apply appropriate styling and layout to enhance the user experience.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement user authentication
tickets.description:
As a user, I want my account to be secure and protected from unauthorized access.

**Tasks:**
- Implement password hashing and salting for user accounts.
- Create a forgot password feature with email verification.
- Implement session management and token-based authentication.
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Implement restaurant rating algorithm
tickets.description:
As a user, I want the restaurant ratings to be accurate and reflect the quality of their services.

**Tasks:**
- Research and select a suitable rating algorithm.
- Implement the rating algorithm on the server-side.
- Update restaurant ratings based on user reviews and ratings.
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Implement push notifications
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to receive push notifications for order updates and promotions.

**Tasks:**
- Research and select a suitable push notification service.
- Implement push notification integration on the server-side.
- Send push notifications for order status updates and promotional offers.
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Implement user profile management
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to manage my profile information and preferences.

**Tasks:**
- Create a profile page with fields for name, email, and contact information.
- Implement server-side validation for the profile form.
- Allow users to update their profile information.
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Implement restaurant management dashboard
tickets.description:
As a restaurant owner, I want to be able to manage my restaurant's information and menu.

**Tasks:**
- Create a restaurant management dashboard with sections for basic information, menu, and reviews.
- Implement server-side validation for the restaurant management forms.
- Allow restaurant owners to update their restaurant's information and menu.
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Implement order history and tracking for users
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to view my order history and track the status of my past orders.

**Tasks:**
- Create an order history page with a list of past orders.
- Fetch and display the details of a selected past order.
- Implement real-time tracking of past order status using websockets.
tickets.author: Olivia

tickets.title: Implement restaurant search and filtering
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to search for restaurants based on various criteria.

**Tasks:**
- Implement a search feature to filter restaurants by name, cuisine, or location.
- Allow users to sort the search results by rating or distance.
- Implement pagination for large search result sets.
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Implement order cancellation and refund
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to cancel my order and receive a refund if necessary.

**Tasks:**
- Create a cancellation form with fields for order ID and reason.

- Process order cancellations and initiate refunds.
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement user notifications
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to receive notifications for order updates, promotions, and other important information.

**Tasks:**

- Send notifications for order status updates, promotions, and other relevant information.
- Allow users to manage their notification preferences.
tickets.author: Michael

tickets.title: Implement user feedback and support
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to provide feedback and get support for any issues or concerns.

**Tasks:**
- Create a feedback form with fields for name, email, and message.
- Implement server-side validation for the feedback form.
- Store the feedback details in the database.
- Provide a support contact for users to reach out.
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Implement user registration and login
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to register and login to the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Create a registration form
- Implement user authentication
- Create a login form

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Users should be able to register with a unique username and password
- Users should be able to login with their registered credentials
- Invalid login attempts should display an error message
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Enable photo uploading and filtering
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to upload photos to the Facetweet platform and apply filters to enhance them.

**Tasks**:
- Create a photo upload form
- Implement photo filtering functionality

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Users should be able to select and upload photos from their device
- Uploaded photos should be displayed on the platform
- Users should be able to apply filters to their uploaded photos
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Implement news feed and timeline
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to view a news feed and timeline on the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Design and implement a news feed and timeline layout

tickets.title: Create user profiles and followers functionality
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to have a profile page on the Facetweet platform and be able to follow other users.

**Tasks**:

tickets.title: Implement direct messaging feature

As a user, I want to be able to send direct messages to other users on the Facetweet platform.

tickets.title: Set up Ruby on Rails backend
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to set up the Ruby on Rails backend for the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:

- Create necessary models and controllers

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Ruby on Rails should be successfully installed
- Models and controllers should be created
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Configure PostgreSQL database
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to configure the PostgreSQL database for the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Install PostgreSQL
- Set up database configuration

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- PostgreSQL should be successfully installed
- Database configuration should be set up
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Integrate React.js frontend
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to integrate React.js as the frontend framework for the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Set up React.js project
- Create necessary components

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- React.js should be successfully integrated
- Components should be created and functional
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement AWS S3 for photo storage
tickets.description:
As a developer, I need to implement AWS S3 for storing uploaded photos on the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Set up AWS S3 account
- Integrate AWS S3 with the backend

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- AWS S3 should be successfully set up
- Uploaded photos should be stored in AWS S3
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Design and implement registration form UI
tickets.description:
As a designer, I need to design and implement the registration form UI for the Facetweet platform.

**Tasks**:
- Design the registration form UI
- Implement the designed UI using HTML and CSS

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- The registration form should have an intuitive and user-friendly design
- The implemented UI should match the design

tickets.description:

**Tasks**:

**Acceptance Criteria**:

- The implemented UI should match the design

tickets.title: Design and implement news feed UI
tickets.description:

tickets.description:

tickets.description:
As a designer, I need to design and implement the direct messaging UI for the Facetweet platform.

tickets.title: Implement user registration and login
tickets.description:
Create screens and functionality for user registration and login.

- Design and implement user registration screen
- Design and implement user login screen
- Integrate Firebase Authentication for user authentication
- Implement logic for user registration and login
- Test user registration and login functionality
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Develop fitness goal setting feature
tickets.description:
Allow users to set fitness goals and track their progress.

- Design and implement fitness goal setting screen
- Implement logic for setting fitness goals
- Store fitness goals in Firebase Firestore
- Test fitness goal setting functionality
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Create workout tracking functionality
tickets.description:
Develop features to track user workouts.

- Design and implement workout tracking screen
- Implement logic for tracking workouts
- Store workout data in Firebase Firestore
- Test workout tracking functionality
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Generate performance insights
tickets.description:
Provide users with insights on their workout performance.

- Design and implement performance insights screen
- Analyze workout data to generate performance insights
- Display performance insights to users
- Test performance insights functionality
tickets.author: Sophia

tickets.title: Integrate calorie tracking
tickets.description:
Include functionality to track calorie intake and expenditure.

- Design and implement calorie tracking screen
- Implement logic for tracking calorie intake and expenditure
- Store calorie data in Firebase Firestore
- Test calorie tracking functionality
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Implement workout reminders
tickets.description:
Develop features to remind users of their scheduled workouts.

- Design and implement workout reminders screen
- Implement logic for scheduling and sending workout reminders
- Test workout reminders functionality
tickets.author: Emma

tickets.title: Design user interface
tickets.description:
Create visually appealing and user-friendly screens for the mobile application.

- Design user interface for all screens
- Implement UI design using Flutter
- Test user interface for usability and responsiveness
tickets.author: Ava

tickets.title: Implement Firebase Authentication
tickets.description:
Integrate Firebase Authentication for user authentication and security.

- Set up Firebase project
- Configure Firebase Authentication
- Test Firebase Authentication functionality
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Set up Firebase Firestore
tickets.description:
Create and configure Firebase Firestore for storing user data.

- Set up Firestore database
- Define data structure for user-related data
- Test Firestore functionality
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Integrate Google Fit API
tickets.description:
Connect the mobile application with the Google Fit API for accessing fitness data.

- Set up Google Fit API integration
- Implement logic for retrieving fitness data from Google Fit
- Test Google Fit API integration
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Implement data synchronization
tickets.description:
Ensure data synchronization between the mobile application and Firebase Firestore.

- Implement logic for syncing local data with Firestore
- Handle conflicts and resolve data inconsistencies
- Test data synchronization functionality
tickets.author: Michael

tickets.title: Add support for multiple user accounts
tickets.description:
Allow multiple users to create accounts and use the fitness tracking app.

- Implement logic for managing multiple user accounts
- Test multiple user account functionality
tickets.author: Daniel

tickets.title: Implement data backup and restore
tickets.description:
Develop features to allow users to backup and restore their fitness data.

- Design and implement data backup and restore screens
- Implement logic for backing up and restoring data
- Test data backup and restore functionality
tickets.author: Isabella

tickets.title: Optimize app performance
tickets.description:
Improve the performance and efficiency of the mobile application.

- Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks
- Implement performance improvements
- Test app performance after optimizations
tickets.author: James

tickets.title: Implement user feedback system
tickets.description:
Create a mechanism for users to provide feedback and report issues.

- Design and implement user feedback screen
- Implement logic for submitting feedback and issue reports
- Test user feedback functionality
tickets.author: David

tickets.title: Perform comprehensive testing
tickets.description:
Thoroughly test the entire application to ensure functionality and reliability.

- Create test cases for all features
- Perform unit testing
- Perform integration testing
- Perform system testing
- Fix any identified bugs or issues
tickets.author: David
